access: You are an  automaton  or are otherwise from the ancient Jistka Imperium.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Golem Dynamo](/Feats.aspx?ID=3132) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 53</row>

**Archetype** [Sterling Dynamo](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=110)

**Prerequisites**
[Sterling Dynamo Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3127)

**Access**
You are an  automaton  or are otherwise from the ancient Jistka Imperium.

</column>

---

You've learned the secrets of Jistkan golem prostheses, allowing you to incorporate golem components into your dynamo and gain a portion of their magic. You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against magic, and your dynamo Strikes become [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103).
name: Golem Dynamo

You gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against magic, and your dynamo Strikes become magical.
